translations: 齐多夫定（抗艾滋病药物）；叠氮胸苷；叠氮胸腺

sentences.sentence: Objective to develop zidovudine tablets and to study its quality-control method.
sentences.translation: 目的制备齐多夫定片并探讨其质量控制方法。

sentences.sentence: Zidovudine (AZT) or Tenofovir (TDF) are recommended as less toxic and equally effective alternatives.
sentences.translation: 建议使用毒性更小但效果相同的齐多夫定(AZT)或泰诺·福韦(TDF)作为替代品。

sentences.sentence: A few drugs have harmful effects when used together and should not be combined (an example is stavudine and zidovudine).
sentences.translation: 某药物一起使用时的会产生有害影响，不应组合使用(例如司他夫定和齐多夫定)。
